code: import axios from'axios';const API_BASE=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'/api';export const register=(email,password)=>axios.post("".concat(API_BASE,"/users/register"),{email,password});export const login=(email,password)=>axios.post("".concat(API_BASE,"/users/login"),new URLSearchParams({username:email,password}));export const getProfile=token=>axios.get("".concat(API_BASE,"/users/me"),{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});export const getBrands=token=>axios.get("".concat(API_BASE,"/brands"),{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});export const addBrand=(token,name,domain)=>axios.post("".concat(API_BASE,"/brands"),{name,domain},{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});export const deleteBrand=(token,brandId)=>axios.delete("".concat(API_BASE,"/brands/").concat(brandId),{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});export const getAlerts=token=>axios.get("".concat(API_BASE,"/alerts"),{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});export const getAlert=(token,alertId)=>axios.get("".concat(API_BASE,"/alerts/").concat(alertId),{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});export const markAlertRead=(token,alertId)=>axios.post("".concat(API_BASE,"/alerts/mark_read"),{alert_id:alertId},{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});
